unnormalised: Borem, mhunnllear, ek pavtt IIT Dillint, hanv bijgonitant khoob tras bhogtalom. Mhunnllear, *khorench* tras bhogtalom. Prof. Sharma, ekdom vhoddlo zanakar, somikoronnanchi pronali sangtale ani maka distalem hanv puraton Sanskrit bhaxant bodol kortam mhunn. Gambhirtayen, hanv `3x + 2y = 7` ani `x - y = 1` bhaxen prosnancher nzhor martalom ani mhojem mon fakt thambun vortalem. Tem fakt ‘x’ ani ‘y’ naxil'lem; te soglle vichar dharonnachem astalem.
normalised: theek asa maka disle I-I-T Delhi antu algebra sangat kathin zatalem kharach kathin zatalem professor Sharma ekdom legend asle tanim systems of equations somzaitalem ani maka distalem hum ancient Sanskrit bhashecho translate kartam hanv ganitache prashnank pahan vhotalem mhunge three x plus two y equals seven ani x minus y equals one ani mazo brain short circuit zatalem fakta x ani y naina punn sarkhem concept

unnormalised: Problem mhunnllear, tutorial maddot korunk nasle. TAs fakt `x = (c1b2 - c2b1) / (a1b2 - a2b1)` ani `y = (a1c2 - a2c1) / (a1b2 - a2b1)` bhaxen formula sangtale...determinants podh'dot... jem, tbh, rote memorization bhaxen distalem. Maka *samzonk* zai aslem tem sogllem khoinchean aila mhunn, fakt ankde bhorunk nhõi. Hanvem MIT OpenCourseware lekhchar online 2.0x gatint (lol) pollovnk proitn kelo, punn tori astana lost distalem!
normalised: problem mhunje tutorials madat korunastale T-A-s formulas ultoitalem mhunge x equals open parenthesis c one b two minus c two b one close parenthesis divided by open parenthesis a one b two minus a two b one close parenthesis ani y equals open parenthesis a one c two minus a two c one close parenthesis divided by open parenthesis a one b two minus a two b one close parenthesis determinants method jem khare sanga maka fakt rote memorization dislem maka zai asalem te kothun aile tem samzachem naka fakt numbers takchem hanvem M-I-T Open Courseware lectures online two point zero x speedan pahancho prayatn kelo hansop ieta punn tarih dukh dislem

unnormalised: Ek dis, hanv canteenant aslom, quiz fail zatokoch zai aslo tea chai-cher dhave ditalom ani mhaka don vhoddleam bhitorchea ulouvnnem aikunk ailem. Te Cramer’s Rule vixim ani matrices vaprun ulaytale. Maka matrices astale mhunn khobor asli (linear algebra dusro sem aslo), punn thoddea promannant. Tannim ekachonne sanglle kelem ki `ax + by = c`, `dx + ey = f` bhaxen somikoronnacho set matrix ganit vaprun sopena sodounk zata. Tannim ek napkinacher kitem tori boroilem - tem `([[a,b],[d,e]]` ani `[x,y]` bhaxen distalem punn maka tankam purayponan kollunk zainam. Hanvem tannim tem sanglem mhunn oddavnni kel'li.
normalised: eka dis hanv canteenant ek cup chachi zai aslem karan ek quiz fail zalo ani maka don seniorsanchem uloup aikuk aile te Cramer's Rule ani matrices vaprun ulop kortale maka mahit asalem matrices asa linear algebra dusrea semant aslem punn khup kamuk ek janan mhonnlem equation set somadhan korunche mhunge a x plus b y equals c d x plus e y equals f te matrix math vaprun sopem zatat tanim eka napkinant kinchiri kaddli dislem double left square bracket a comma b close square bracket comma open square bracket d comma e double close square bracket ani open square bracket x comma y close square bracket punn maka kinchuch samzunaulem hanvem tanko samzaunk vicharlem

unnormalised: Ani hangam jaduchi ghoddnnuk ghoddli. Ek vhoddleancho, Rohan (hanv taka aizun vhoddlo opkari), taka anik ek formula diunk naslo. Tannem asloli tarkikta sanglem. Tannem mhaka dakhoilem ki kiteak hi somikoronnam matrix bhaxen dakhouk zatat ani matrix karvai koxe bhoxen variable alag koronk zatat. `A*X=B`, tannem sanglle, zoim `A` coefficients hanchem matrix (kitem tori `[[2, 1],[1, -1]]` bhaxen), `X` variable sodounkachem matrix `[x, y]` ani `B` resultant vector (dhaum, `[5, 1]`). `X` khatir sodovpak inverses ani vostu astale, punn Rohan-an ganit kelem ani mhaka dakhoilem ki tem teech nateachem result kortat!
normalised: ani iteun magic ghoddlem ek senior Rohan maka tarih tancho upkar asa tanka maka dusrea formula naina dila tanim temel logic samzailem tanim maka dakoilem koxem tem equations matrix asun represent korunk zata ani koxem matrix operations variables isolate korunk zata A asterisk X equals B tanim mhonnlem jem A asa coefficientsacho matrix asa mhunge double left square bracket two comma one close square bracket comma open square bracket one comma minus one double close square bracket X asa variablesacho matrix somadhan korunche open square bracket x comma y close square bracket ani B asa result vector mhunge open square bracket five comma one close square bracket X sothe sodank inverses ani sarkem asa punn Rohan math kelo ani maka tem sarkhem result zata dakoilem

unnormalised: Tannem tarvajanchea tulnek ek sopn diullolem. Dor ek somikoronn, tannem sanglle, ek sambhalli tarvaj astalem. Tum tumchea donui bazunch ekach vostu korunk zatalem (plus, minus, multiply, divide) sambhallonachea tras diunastana, nimanne tum jacher utsuk asat tea variable alag kortana. Soglem kiteak aila tumchea monant vochpak suru zatokoch. Tem formula memoriz korchem nhhoi; tem niyamachem somikoronnam halovpachem, solution ugddo kortana. Determinant `D = ad - bc` tannem sanglle, to scalingak maddot korta. Hachi maddot formula asloli karvai real manovpank gheun ailem.
normalised: tanim scales balance koruncho ek udaharan dila tankam each equation he mhunnle tem balance asa tumim sarkhem operation donui bazunk korunk zata add subtract multiply divide balance bigodunakai jitle tumik interest asa te variable tumik isolate korunk lagta tumik sudden things click korunk suru kelem tem formula memorizingacho vixay nasel tem equations legally manipulate korunche ani solution utor korunk determinant D equals a d minus b c tankam mhonnlem hem scaling sodunk madat korta hanvem formula real manipulationanchem ulounk madat keli

unnormalised: Rohan-an mhaka 3 somikoronnanchi pronali koxe bhaxen sodovpachem dakhoilem (dhaum, `x + y + z = 6`, `2x - y + z = 3`, `x + 2y - z = 2` ) teech tatvo vaprun. Hem vhoddlem karonn mhojem fuddarachem asnment `(a+b)^2 = a^2 + 2ab + b^2` bhaxen vostu astat. He ani sopena zalolim disli! Tem fakt ‘x’ ani ‘y’ khatir sodovpachem nhhoi astalem; tem bijgonitan halovpachea vhoddlean tatvanche vixim astalem. `x^2 + 5x + 6 = 0` mhunnllear kitem tem samzonk zait, hem kitlench sope zalem!
normalised: Rohan mhunnlem koxem three equations somadhan korunche mhunge x plus y plus z equals six two x minus y plus z equals three x plus two y minus z equals two sarkhem principles vaprun hem bahut motem aslem karan maze pudle assignmentant open parenthesis a plus b close parenthesis squared equals a squared plus two a b plus b squared sorkhem zai aslem hem fokot x ani y somadhan karochech naina punn algebraic manipulationank temel principles samzachem sudden understanding mhunnje x squared plus five x plus six equals zero tem sadem zatalem

unnormalised: Tea chai-ponnanchi bijgonitant tanchi xikkounnani sogllem bodloilem. Maka nimannem kiteak cholon ailem ani quizzes acing korunk suru kelem. Hanvem dusrea bhurgeank ji tras bhogtole tankam maddot korunk suru kelem, Rohan-anchem sanglle dilem. Mhunn hanvem, hi mhoji bijgonitanchi kotha. Tum somikoronnanchi pronali bhogot asat zalear, formula memoriz korunk nhoi. Konnaka taka sodun haddat zaka asloli tarkikta tumkam sangonk zata. Vo ani tumchea professorak vo class topersank vo tanchi TAsank vicharat! Hem sogllea sansarant tras dista. Ani dhaum, ek chai tanchea sangatant vatnni korat.
normalised: te chachi fueled algebra lessonak soglem bodolun uddoilem hanvem somzok suru kelem ani quizzes acing koruncho prayatn kelo hanvem tancho upkar kelo jem dusrea studentsank somzonk laglem Rohan explanation passar korunche mhunnlear haka algebra story asa tumka systems of equations sangat duk dista haka formulae memorise naka karunk tumka konnacho madat ghevnk zatale professoranche madat taka lagta tumcho class toppersachem taka lagta T-A-sachem taka lagta tumcha jivitant bahut aslem ani maka thodi chachi divnk dii
